data.actual_result: Chat position will move around as new messages come in
data.expected_result: Chat history will keep position as you scroll further back
data.short_description: Chat changes position when new messages come in while scrolling.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any active chat - Scroll upward as if you were seeking back through the chat history - Have a message come in during this - Observe - (It may be easier to reproduce if you hold your finger on the screen as if you were going to scroll while waiting for an incoming message
